metadata.Title: CVE-2019-12046 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
LemonLDAP::NG -2.0.3 has Incorrect Access Control.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-12046` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

lemonldap-ng - 2.0.14+ds-1
lemonldap-ng-fastcgi-server - 2.0.14+ds-1
lemonldap-ng-handler - 2.0.14+ds-1
lemonldap-ng-uwsgi-app - 2.0.14+ds-1
liblemonldap-ng-common-perl - 2.0.14+ds-1
liblemonldap-ng-handler-perl - 2.0.14+ds-1
liblemonldap-ng-manager-perl - 2.0.14+ds-1
liblemonldap-ng-portal-perl - 2.0.14+ds-1
liblemonldap-ng-ssoaas-apache-client-perl - 2.0.14+ds-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lemonldap-ng package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.14+ds-1').
